It offers savings and current accounts, and deposits; home, multipurpose, automobile, personal, working capital, and investment loans; credit programs; credit and debit cards; mutual funds, insurance products, FX products, bonds, and structured products; and premier and private banking services. The company also provides treasury products; cash management and trade finance services; supplier financing, export, and import services; and Web and mobile banking, and payment services. In addition, it offers bank reference, bank comfort, and confirmation letters; safe deposit boxes; telegraphic transfers; and remittance and e-tax services. The company operates through a network of 236 offices and 592 ATMs. PT Bank OCBC NISP Tbk was formerly known as PT Bank NISP Tbk. The company was incorporated in 1941 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank OCBC NISP Tbk is a subsidiary of OCBC Overseas Investments Pte. Ltd.

NKX.MU.summary: PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk provides various banking products and services to small to medium enterprises, individuals, and corporate customers in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Corporate, Business, Retail, Treasury, and Sharia segments. It offers consumer banking products and services, including mortgage, auto, and personal loans, as well as partnership vehicle ownership financing; credit and debit cards; wealth management products; general and life bancassurance products; savings products; digital banking services; saving, current, time, and term deposit products; digital banking products and services; treasury products comprising foreign exchange, strike currency, market linked deposits, swap depos and bonds, and mutual fund products. The company also provides business banking products and services comprising working capital, investment, and financing loans; cash management, trade finance, and other bank services; treasury services that include foreign exchange, money market, derivatives, placements investing, securities transactions, and hedging products; and remittance and value chain services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated a network of 451 branches; 4,316 ATMs; 133 cash deposit machines; and 801 cash recycle machines. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Niaga Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk in May 2008. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk is a subsidiary of CIMB Group Sdn Bhd.

NOBU.JK.summary: PT Bank Nationalnobu Tbk provides banking products and services. The company operates in Corporate and Treasury segments. It offers savings products; and working capital investment loans, consumer, car, housing, apartment, and office loans. The company also provides debit cards, internet banking, mobile banking, and wealth management services; treasury services, such as foreign exchange transactions and hedging, and investment products. It operates through a network of 41 branch offices, 63 cash offices, and 222 ATMs, as well as a 6 sub branch office in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Alfindo. PT Bank Nationalnobu Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

OHH.F.summary: PT Panin Financial Tbk provides business consulting, management, and administration services to the general public in Indonesia. The company also offers information technology and management information system services. In addition, it provides life insurance products, including death, whole life, annuity, endowment, endowment combine, universal life, unit-linked, personal accident, and health; and term insurance products. The company was formerly known as PT Panin Life Tbk and changed its name to PT Panin Financial Tbk in January 2010. PT Panin Financial Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Panin Financial Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Paninvest Tbk.

P7T.F.long_name: PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Timur Tbk
P7T.F.summary: PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Timur Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company offers savings and current accounts, and fixed and time deposits; personal and productivity loans; and property construction loans, bank guarantees, checking accounts, investment loans, credit modal Kerja, syndicated loans, financing receivables loans, cash collateral credit, local government loans, and Bureau of Public Service Area loans. It also provides common foreign exchange, hedging forward contract, hedging swap, bank note, deposit on call, and documentation services. In addition, the company offers Sharia savings, deposit, and financing products; merchant relationship program; automated teller machines (ATM), Internet and mobile banking services; SMS banking services; virtual accounts; electronic government staff, debit cards, and prepaid cards; and foreign exchange transaction and remittance services. Further, it provides letters of credit; import tax and letter of credit undocumented affair services; bank guarantee forex services; safe deposit boxes; and money transfer and other banking services. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 41 branches, 7 Sharia branches, 162 conventional sub branches, 10 Sharia sub-branches, 209 cash offices, 247 payment points, 9 Sharia payment points, 195 Sharia service offices, 777 ATMs, 24 Sharia ATMs, 27 automated deposit machines, 92 cash conventional ATM vehicles, and 6 cash Sharia ATM vehicles. PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Timur Tbk was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

PADI.JK.long_name: PT Minna Padi Investama Sekuritas Tbk
PADI.JK.summary: PT Minna Padi Investama Sekuritas Tbk engages in the securities brokerage and underwriting activities in Indonesia. It offers trading and brokerage services for equity or debt securities in the secondary market; underwriting services for initial public offerings and rights issues, bonds, and other convertible bonds, as well as acts as an arranger in private placements; and corporate finance services, such as financial advisory, restructuring, and merger and acquisition services. The company was formerly known as PT Minna Padi Investama Tbk and changed its name to PT Minna Padi Investama Sekuritas Tbk in March 2017. PT Minna Padi Investama Sekuritas Tbk was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PANS.JK.summary: PT Panin Sekuritas Tbk provides securities brokerage, underwriting, and investment management services in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT. Nusamas Panin and changed its name to PT Panin Sekuritas Tbk in June 1995. PT Panin Sekuritas Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

PBCRF.summary: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services to individual, corporate, and small and medium enterprise customers in Indonesia and internationally. It offers deposits accounts, loans, transaction banking services, electronic banking services, cash management services, credit cards, bancassurance products, mutual fund and treasury investment products, credit facilities, standby LC/bank guarantees, export import facilities, local LC, and foreign exchange facilities. The company also provides investment financing, working capital financing, auto and multipurpose financing, operating lease, other financing activities, money lending and remittance, securities brokerage dealing and securities issuance underwriting, general or loss insurance, life insurance, Sharia banking, and venture capital services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,248 offices comprising 139 main branches, 874 sub-branches, and 235 cash offices; and 17,623 automated teller machines. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwimuria Investama Andalan.

PBCRY.summary: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services to individual, corporate, and small and medium enterprise customers in Indonesia and internationally. It offers deposits accounts, loans, transaction banking services, electronic banking services, cash management services, credit cards, bancassurance products, mutual fund and treasury investment products, credit facilities, standby LC/bank guarantees, export import facilities, local LC, and foreign exchange facilities. The company also provides investment financing, working capital financing, auto and multipurpose financing, operating lease, other financing activities, money lending and remittance, securities brokerage dealing and securities issuance underwriting, general or loss insurance, life insurance, Sharia banking, and venture capital services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,248 offices comprising 139 main branches, 874 sub-branches, and 235 cash offices; and 17,623 automated teller machines. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwimuria Investama Andalan.

PEGE.JK.summary: PT Panca Global Kapital Tbk engages in the brokerage and underwriting services in Indonesia. It is also involved in development and investment business, as well as general trading activities. The company was formerly known as PT Panca Global Securities Tbk. PT Panca Global Kapital Tbk was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PNBN.JK.summary: P.T. Bank Pan Indonesia Tbk together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through Banking and Multifinance segments. The company offers savings and current accounts, accounts for investment at capital market, and savings plans and time deposits. It also provides mortgage, car, personal, commercial, corporate, and syndicate loans, as well as multi-purpose credit facility and credit cards. In addition, the company offers forward transaction, foreign exchange, today, tomorrow, spot, and forex swap transaction services; and phone, mobile, and Internet banking, as well as automated teller machine services. Further, it offers custodial services consisting of handling the settlement of securities transaction, safekeeping and administration of securities, and other related services, such as corporate actions, payments of coupon, dividends, bonus payments, payments of securities at maturity date, and others; and mutual funds, bancassurance products, and bonds, as well as risk profiles. Additionally, the company provides bank drafts, safe deposit boxes, and letters of credit with domestic documents; and export and import, bank draft, collection, domestic and fund transfer, cash management, and sharia banking and financing services. It operates 57 main branch offices in Indonesia and 1 representative office in Singapore. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PNBS.JK.long_name: PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk
PNBS.JK.summary: PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk operates as a sharia commercial bank for retail, commercial, and corporate customers in Indonesia. It accepts demand, time, current, savings, and other forms of deposits, as well as certificates of deposit. The company also offers PaS iB profit sharing, working capital, house ownership, investment, multi-service, car ownership, sharia revolving, and other financing products. In addition, it purchases securities based on sharia principles, such as retail Sukuk, government sharia bonds, and corporate Sukuk; and issues reference letters. Further, it provides debit cards, online and mobile banking, billing payment, insurance, safe deposit box, real time gross settlement, bank guarantee, PDSB standing order, and clearing services, as well as cash management systems. It operates through a network of 17 branch offices, and 22 ATMs. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Panin Syariah Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk in July 2016. PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Panin Dubai Syariah Tbk is a subsidiary of P.T. Bank Pan Indonesia Tbk.

PNIN.JK.summary: PT Paninvest Tbk provides life insurance products in Indonesia. It operates through Life Insurance and Business Consulting Service, Trading and Service, and Tourism segments. The company offers death, personal health, personal accident, unit link, and other insurance products. It also provides business consulting and management, and general administration services, as well as management consulting services in the field of archives. In addition, the company engages in the mutual funds business. The company was formerly known as Pt Panin Insurance Tbk and changed its name to PT Paninvest Tbk in May 2014. PT Paninvest Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PNLF.JK.summary: PT Panin Financial Tbk provides business consulting, management, and administration services to the general public in Indonesia. The company also offers information technology and management information system services. In addition, it provides life insurance products, including death, whole life, annuity, endowment, endowment combine, universal life, unit-linked, personal accident, and health; and term insurance products. The company was formerly known as PT Panin Life Tbk and changed its name to PT Panin Financial Tbk in January 2010. PT Panin Financial Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Panin Financial Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Paninvest Tbk.

POLA.JK.summary: PT Pool Advista Finance Tbk operates as a financing company in Indonesia. It offers investment, working capital, multipurpose, and sharia financing. The company was formerly known as PT Indojasa Pratama Finance and changed its name to PT Pool Advista Finance Tbk in November 2017. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Pool Advista Finance Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pool Advista Indonesia Tbk.

PPERF.summary: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services to individuals and businesses in Indonesia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Timor Leste, Shanghai, Malaysia, the United Kingdom, and the Cayman Islands. It offers savings and current accounts, time deposits, demand deposits, and foreign currency savings and current accounts; motorcycle loans and housing loans, as well as loans for various purposes, such as education, home renovation, marriage, health, and other needs for individuals; and working capital loans, investment loans, people's business loans, syndicated loans, and micro business loans for businesses. The company also provides investment products comprising mutual funds and retail state bonds; life, health, and general insurance products; credit, debit, and corporate cards; e-banking services; cash management services; trade finance services, such as financial supply chain management, value chain, import and export, and bank guarantee and standby letters of credit services; custodial services; treasury services, including cash transaction/liquidity and hedging products; trust services comprising trustee, paying agent, security agent, escrow agent, monitoring agent, and receiving bank services; and bankassurance, money transfer, and remittance services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 2,714 office networks and 13,217 ATM networks. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PPERY.summary: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services to individuals and businesses in Indonesia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Timor Leste, Shanghai, Malaysia, the United Kingdom, and the Cayman Islands. It offers savings and current accounts, time deposits, demand deposits, and foreign currency savings and current accounts; motorcycle loans and housing loans, as well as loans for various purposes, such as education, home renovation, marriage, health, and other needs for individuals; and working capital loans, investment loans, people's business loans, syndicated loans, and micro business loans for businesses. The company also provides investment products comprising mutual funds and retail state bonds; life, health, and general insurance products; credit, debit, and corporate cards; e-banking services; cash management services; trade finance services, such as financial supply chain management, value chain, import and export, and bank guarantee and standby letters of credit services; custodial services; treasury services, including cash transaction/liquidity and hedging products; trust services comprising trustee, paying agent, security agent, escrow agent, monitoring agent, and receiving bank services; and bankassurance, money transfer, and remittance services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 2,714 office networks and 13,217 ATM networks. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PQ9.F.summary: PT Bank Mandiri (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services to individuals and businesses in Indonesia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Timor Leste, Shanghai, Malaysia, the United Kingdom, and the Cayman Islands. It offers savings and current accounts, time deposits, demand deposits, and foreign currency savings and current accounts; motorcycle loans and housing loans, as well as loans for various purposes, such as education, home renovation, marriage, health, and other needs for individuals; and working capital loans, investment loans, people's business loans, syndicated loans, and micro business loans for businesses. The company also provides investment products comprising mutual funds and retail state bonds; life, health, and general insurance products; credit, debit, and corporate cards; e-banking services; cash management services; trade finance services, such as financial supply chain management, value chain, import and export, and bank guarantee and standby letters of credit services; custodial services; treasury services, including cash transaction/liquidity and hedging products; trust services comprising trustee, paying agent, security agent, escrow agent, monitoring agent, and receiving bank services; and bankassurance, money transfer, and remittance services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 2,714 office networks and 13,217 ATM networks. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PTAYF.summary: PT Asuransi Ramayana Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a general insurance company in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, General Insurance and Rental of Office Buildings. It offers fire, marine cargo, motor vehicle, marine hull, aviation, engineering, bond, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company also engages in building and vehicle rental activities. PT Asuransi Ramayana Tbk was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

PTQ.F.summary: P.T. Bank Pan Indonesia Tbk together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through Banking and Multifinance segments. The company offers savings and current accounts, accounts for investment at capital market, and savings plans and time deposits. It also provides mortgage, car, personal, commercial, corporate, and syndicate loans, as well as multi-purpose credit facility and credit cards. In addition, the company offers forward transaction, foreign exchange, today, tomorrow, spot, and forex swap transaction services; and phone, mobile, and Internet banking, as well as automated teller machine services. Further, it offers custodial services consisting of handling the settlement of securities transaction, safekeeping and administration of securities, and other related services, such as corporate actions, payments of coupon, dividends, bonus payments, payments of securities at maturity date, and others; and mutual funds, bancassurance products, and bonds, as well as risk profiles. Additionally, the company provides bank drafts, safe deposit boxes, and letters of credit with domestic documents; and export and import, bank draft, collection, domestic and fund transfer, cash management, and sharia banking and financing services. It operates 57 main branch offices in Indonesia and 1 representative office in Singapore. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

QF8.F.summary: PT Mandala Multifinance Tbk engages in consumer financing activities in Java, Sumatera, Sulawesi, and Kalimantan in Indonesia. It offers motorcycle financing services based on conventional and sharia financing, as well as electronic and furniture, and car financing services. The company was formerly known as PT Gracia Dinamika Multifinance and changed its name to PT Mandala Multifinance Tbk in March 1997. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Mandala Multifinance Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Jayamandiri Gemasejati.

RELI.JK.summary: PT Reliance Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk provides securities brokerage and underwriting services in Indonesia and internationally. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. PT Reliance Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Reliance Capital Management.

SDRA.JK.long_name: PT Bank Woori Saudara Indonesia 1906 Tbk
SDRA.JK.summary: PT Bank Woori Saudara Indonesia 1906 Tbk provides various commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Indonesia. The company provides current and savings accounts, and time and demand deposits; employee, worker, and franchise loans; micro, small, and medium enterprises loans; and corporate and mortgage loans. It also offers remittance collection/clearing, ATM, credit card and telephone bill payment, bancassurance, bank mediation, international and Internet banking, state revenue, and electronic data capture services. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Woori Saudara Indonesia 1906 Tbk is a subsidiary of Woori Bank, Korea.

SFAN.JK.summary: PT Surya Fajar Capital Tbk provides financial advisory services. The company offers advisory services in the areas of pre-IPO restructuring, group restructuring, debt restructuring, mergers and acquisitions, and IPO and back door listing, as well as on right issues, venture capital, private placements, tailor made financing, medium term notes, and bank loans. PT Surya Fajar Capital Tbk was founded in 2015 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

SMMA.JK.summary: PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk provides various financial services to individual and corporate clients in Indonesia. The company's services include banking, insurance, financing, capital markets, asset management, share administration, security, and information technology. It offers savings accounts; call, time, and demand deposits; foreign exchange; mutual funds; bancassurance; corporate and personal credit cards; bank guarantee; loan products, including micro, working capital, investment, non-collateral, agricultural, and multi-purpose loan; supply chain financing; consumer financing; import and export bill; telegraphic transfer; and mobile and internet banking, as well as automatic teller machine, safe deposit box, payroll, and money transfer services. The company also provides life and general insurance, insurance agency, securities and share registry, asset management, commodity trading, factoring, leasing, investment financing, and fund management services. In addition, it is involved in trading and service, auction house, property, clinic, and workshop activities. The company was formerly known as PT Internas Artha Finance Company and changed its name to PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk in February 1995. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Cakrawala.

SRTG.JK.summary: PT Saratoga Investama Sedaya Tbk is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in early stage, growth stage and special situations investments. It primarily invests in natural resources, energy, infrastructure, telecommunication, shipping, pharmaceutical, retail, food and beverage, and consumer goods sectors. The firm seeks to make investments in Indonesia. It focuses on acquisitions that are six to eight times EBITDA. The firm seeks to hold its investments for a period of three to five years. Saratoga Capital Investment was founded in 1997 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia with an additional office in Singapore, Singapore.

TA2.SG.summary: PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company offers savings and current accounts; demand and time deposits; certificates of deposit; and debit cards. It also provides subsidized and other mortgages; consumer and construction loans; micro and small medium enterprise credits; commercial and institutional funding services; and credit cards. In addition, the company issues debts instruments; buys and sells bills of exchange, promissory notes, commercial papers, treasury bills, government insurance notes, Bank Indonesia certificates, bonds, and other securities instruments; places, borrows, or lends funds from other banks; receives payment from securities bills; acts as a pension fund provider and manager; and conducts Sharia-principle business activities. Further, it offers safekeeping, factoring, trustee, investment banking, treasury, asset management, wealth management, electronic data capture, cash management, branchless banking, bank guarantees, safe deposit box, transfer or remittance, payroll, and other banking services; and electronic banking services, such as automatic teller machine and KiosK, cash deposit machine, internet, virtual account, SMS, and mobile banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 103 branches, including 25 Sharia branches; 373 sub-branches comprising 59 Sharia sub-branches; 254 cash offices, including 7 Sharia cash offices; and 3,014 system online payment point/online post offices. The company was formerly known as Bank Tabungan Pos and changed its name to PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk in 1963. PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TIFA.JK.summary: PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk engages in the investment financing, working capital financing, and multipurpose financing businesses in Indonesia. It operates in four segments: Finance Lease, Multipurpose Financing, Factoring, and Operating Lease. It also offers sharia financing. The company was formerly known as PT Tifa Finance Tbk and changed its name to PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk in September 2020. PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. As of September 8, 2020, PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk operates as a subsidiary of Korea Development Bank.

TRIM.JK.summary: PT Trimegah Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk engages in the securities brokerage and underwriting, and investment management activities in Indonesia. Its Equity trading division provides equity brokerage services for retail and institutional clients. This division offers equity sales service in the primary market and serves as equity brokerage in the secondary market to institutional investors, such as asset management companies, pension funds, and sub-broking clients. The company's fixed income trading division facilitates government bond transactions, including retail government, retail and saving Sharia government, savings bond retail, and corporate bonds. This division serves insurance companies, fund managers, pension funds, banks, and other securities companies. Its Investment Banking division provides bonds and equity underwriting services, as well as financial advisory services comprising merger and acquisition, divestment, valuation, due diligence, corporate restructuring, and financing. The company also provides equity, balanced, fixed income, and money market funds for corporations, financial institutions, and pension funds, as well as acts as a mutual funds selling agent. In addition, it offers online trading services. The company was formerly known as PT Trimegah Securities Tbk and changed its name to PT Trimegah Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk in July 2016. PT Trimegah Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TRUS.JK.summary: PT. Trust Finance Indonesia Tbk provides financing services in Indonesia. The company offers investment financing services comprising financing of heavy equipment, trucks, digital printing and printing machines, industrial machineries, and medical devices. The company also provides working capital financing solutions, including sale and lease back, factoring, and business capital facilities. In addition, it offers financing for houses and apartments, cars, motorcycles, education, and tour/travel expenses, as well as for the purchase of household appliances and other consumptive products. The company was formerly known as PT KIA Asia Finance and changed its name to PT. Trust Finance Indonesia Tbk in February 2002. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TUGU.JK.long_name: PT Asuransi Tugu Pratama Indonesia Tbk
TUGU.JK.summary: PT Asuransi Tugu Pratama Indonesia Tbk engages in general insurance, reinsurance, and sharia businesses in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: General Insurance, Reinsurance, Rental and Related Businesses, and Others. The company offers onshore and offshore energy, fire and property, marine, satellite and aviation, engineering, and health insurance products; and product, aviation products, grounding, aviation premies, hangar keepers', charterer's, automobile, freight forwarder, professional indemnity, air navigation service provider, ship repairers', port and terminal, and satellite de-orbit third party liability insurances. It also provides credit and suretyship insurance products; bank guarantees, such as bid, performance, advance payment, and maintenance bond insurance; miscellaneous insurance products comprising workmen's compensation, money, burglary/theft, hole in one, fidelity guarantee, kidnap and ransom, neon sign, billboard, and videotron insurances; and Sharia insurance products comprising business interruption, burglary, money insurance, marine cargo, liability suit, engineering, heavy equipment insurance, personal accident insurance, and motor vehicles insurances. In addition, the company invests in stocks and mutual funds; develops, rents, trades in, and services real estate properties; and offers brokerage and reinsurance consultancy services, as well as risk management, survey, and valuation services. The company was formerly known as PT Tugu Pratama Indonesia. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Asuransi Tugu Pratama Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pertamina (Persero) Tbk.

VICO.JK.summary: PT Victoria Investama Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides financial services in Indonesia. It offers commercial banking products and services, which includes saving and current accounts, deposits, and investment products; and loan products, which include consumer and production credit. The company also operates as a security broker and underwriter for individual client, and local and foreign business entities; and manages securities and securities products, such as stocks, bonds, and other assets, including property. In addition, it offers general insurance products, such as assurance of property, motorized vehicles, personal accidents, transportation, engineering, money, liability, and boat frame to multi finance companies, banks, local government, state-owned enterprises, private companies, and individuals. Further, the company provides corporate finance and advisory management services, as well as act as a fund arranger. The company was formerly known as PT Victoria Sekuritas and changed its name to PT Victoria Investama Tbk in 2012. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Victoria Investama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Gratamulia Pratama.

VINS.JK.summary: PT Victoria Insurance Tbk provides general insurance products and services in Indonesia. The company offers fire, motor vehicle, marine transportation, engineering, surety bond, personal accident, health, hull, liability, property, and freight insurance products. It serves finance, banking, state-owned enterprise, and private and individual customers. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Victoria Insurance Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Victoria Investama Tbk.

VRNA.JK.summary: PT. Verena Multi Finance Tbk provides consumer finance and leasing services to individuals and financial institutions in Indonesia. The company offers financing for new and used cars; and investment and working capital financing services, as well as financial leasing for heavy equipment and production machines. It operates through 21 branches in Bandung, Bogor, Cikarang, Jakarta, Makassar, Depok, Malang, Medan, Palembang, Pekanbaru, Samarinda, Semarang, Serang, Surabaya, and Tangerang cities. The company was formerly known as PT. Verena Oto Finance Tbk and changed its name to PT. Verena Multi Finance Tbk in January 2011. PT. Verena Multi Finance Tbk was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Verena Multi Finance Tbk is a subsidiary of Mizuho Leasing Company, Limited

WOMF.JK.summary: PT Wahana Ottomitra Multiartha Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in consumer financing activities in Indonesia. The company offers investment financing and working capital financing services, such as finance lease, sale and leaseback, factoring, project financing, and infrastructure financing, as well as purchase payment by installments and other financing services. It also provides financing services for new and used two-wheeled and four-wheeled motor vehicles. The company was formerly known as PT Wahana Ometraco Multi Artha and changed its name to PT Wahana Ottomitra Multiartha Tbk in March 2000. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. PT Wahana Ottomitra Multiartha Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bank Maybank Indonesia Tbk.

YULE.JK.summary: PT Yulie Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk operates as a securities company. The company operates through two divisions, Securities Brokerage Trading and Underwriting. The Securities Brokerage Trading division provides stock sales services in the primary market and intermediary stock traders in the secondary market for retail and institutional clients. The Underwriting division provides stock and bonds underwriting services. The company, formerly known as PT Yulie Sekurindo Tbk, was founded in 1989 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
